Gallatin School of Individualized Study Graduate Academics
Gallatin School of Individualized Study Graduate Academics

Website detailing the components of graduate education at Gallatin. The website includes information degree requirements, the curriculum for enrollees before and after summer 2013, the master's thesis, graduate student community, and financial aid. The website details the core courses, elective courses, independent study, tutorials, internships, private lessons, advising, courses outside of NYU, and other NYU courses.
